DOC.brief_title: An Exploratory Study Compare Differences Nutritional Status Between Patients With Mild Moderate Alzheimer 's Disease ( AD ) Cognitively Intact Healthy People Asian Population
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective current Asian nutritional status study get insight nutritional status AD patient Asian population Asia . Plasma level several micronutrient fatty acid profile compare patient mild moderate AD cognitively intact healthy control Asian population
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 50 year old Asian ethnicity Group 1 : Cognitively intact healthy volunteer define Cumulative Illness Rating Scale Geriatrics rating ≤ 2 category except category `` psychiatric illness '' rating 0 CDR 0 within 1 year prior visit . OR Group 2a : AD patient clinically diagnose mild AD ( accord National Institute Neurological Communicative Disorders , StrokeAlzheimer 's Disease Related Disorders criterion ( McKhann et al. , 1984 ) ) Clinical Dementia Rating1 OR Group 2b : AD patient clinically diagnose moderate AD ( accord National Institute Neurological Communicative Disorders , StrokeAlzheimer 's Disease Related Disorders criterion ( McKhann et al. , 1984 ) ) Clinical Dementia Rating2 Written inform consent provide accord local regulation . Group 1 : Current diagnosis AD dementia accord National Institute Neurological Communicative Disorders , StrokeAlzheimer 's Disease Related Disorders criterion ( McKhann et al.,1984 ) Group 2 : Change dose within 2 month prior visit AD medication ( e.g . donepezil , rivastigmine , galantamine memantine ) Group 1 2 : Diagnosis significant neurological disease ( Groups 2a 2b : AD ) , include vascular dementia accord National Institute Neurological Communicative Disorders , StrokeAlzheimer 's Disease Related Disorders criterion , cerebral tumour , Huntington 's Disease , Parkinson 's Disease , normal pressure hydrocephalus , seizure , major depression , schizophrenia entity Use vitamins supplement ( vitamin supplement C D allow ) 3 month prior visit Use vitamin B injection Alcohol drug abuse per investigator 's judgement Investigator 's uncertainty willingness ability patient comply protocol requirement Participation study involve investigational market product concomitantly within two week prior entry study
